resources.string: Before you begin, you need to tell us a little about your Empire. Fill in the details below to get started.
What name will you go by in the game?
Drag the sliders to adjust focus.
Select the star you want to move your fleet to and click "Move"
Select all of the fleets that you want to merge. You can only select fleets of the same type.
Sign in error, please try again later.

Enter an email address. We\'ll send you an email to verify it and then your account will be associated with that address. You will be able to log in to this account from another device, and you\'ll be able to recover it later as well.
We\'re going to send you an email, please click the link in the email to verify that it\'s your email address and then come back here.

Thanks for verifying your email address, verification is now complete and you can continue playing War Worlds. If you access your account through another device using the same email address, the game will be automatically synchronised between the two devices automatically.
This account is already associated with another email address. Do you want to associate it with this new address instead?
This email address is associated with a different account. Do you want to associate with this account instead? You will not be able to access the old account if you do.
Connect your empire to your Patreon account in order to collect your benefits!\n\n And of course, click here to support me if you\'re not already!
You can purchase the ability to rename your empire for %1s below. Enter a new name and click "Rename".
You can upload a custom shield image for %1s. Note: shield images will be reviewed and inappropriate images will be removed.\n\n Click here for more information.

Resetting your empire will destroy your current empire and allow you to restart the game from a fresh star. The cost of this purchase increases as the size of your empire increase: to reset an empire with four stars or less is free, resetting an empire with up to 10 stars is %1s and resetting an empire with > 10 stars is %2s.
